Issue.creator: nnao
Issue.summary: A mismatched version number between command and its description in the peer chaincode document
Issue.description: At version `1.0` on channel `mychannel` to version `1.1`, … Here is a command {code:java} peer chaincode upgrade -o orderer.example.com:7050 --tls --cafile $ORDERER_CA -C mychannel -n mycc -v 1.2 -c '\{"Args": "init","a","100","b","200","c","300" }' -P "AND ('Org1MSP.peer','Org2MSP.peer')" {code} https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/commands/peerchaincode.html#peer-chaincode-upgrade-example >
